title: Better Than Another Man
description: Better than Another Man is a love story between two best friends, Bryan and Carey. Bryan is straight and Carey is gay, but they stand by each other through the milestones of their lives, including Carey’s coming out. But when a family tragedy strikes, Bryan turns to Carey for support, and their relationship moves in an unexpected direction.Can a straight man and a gay man enter into an intimate relationship, or will it destroy their friendship forever?Who knows Better Than Another Man…
author: H.K. Carlton
